participant_1.background:
I love hanging out with my girlfriend and listening to death metal.
I drive a family-friendly SUV that can handle any weather conditions.
i prefer headsets over earbuds.
I enjoy the peace and quiet of the woods when I go hiking on the weekends.
i read fantasy fiction novels.

participant_2.background:
I've spent many hours watching my lizard Gila basking in the sun.
My commute is the best part of my day, as I get to listen to my favorite music and think about my robotics projects.
i volunteer at animal shelters.
i like antiques.
I have been single for a while now and enjoy spending my time fishing and relaxing.

content.text: Hey! I'm a big fan of fantasy fiction novels and death metal. What about you?
Not really into fantasy fiction, but I do love death metal! I've been a fan for a long time.
That's cool! What are some of your favorite bands?
I really like Cannibal Corpse, Deicide, Obituary, and Morbid Angel.
Nice! I'm a big fan of Cannibal Corpse and Deicide. I've never really listened to Obituary or Morbid Angel, though.
You should check them out! They're both great bands.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
What do you do for fun?
I like to volunteer at my local animal shelter, go fishing, and relax.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to hike and go camping.
Hiking sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been camping, though.
You should try it! It's really fun to get out in nature and relax.
I might have to try it sometime.
That's great! I hope you enjoy it.
